marketplaces.name: peerasak-marketplace
marketplaces.description: Marketplace for skills by Peerasak Unsakon

files.README.md:
# Peerasak's Claude Code Marketplace

> A collection of plugins for Claude Code focusing on macOS automation and productivity.

## Overview

This marketplace provides **2 plugins** for macOS automation workflows.

Browse and install plugins:

```bash
/plugin marketplace add peerasak-u/peerasak-claude-marketplace
/plugin install <plugin-name>
```

**[â†’ View Plugin Catalog](docs/plugins.md)**

## Requirements

- macOS (uses JXA and Apple Mail.app)
- [Bun](https://bun.sh) - JavaScript runtime and package manager
- For send-to-kindle: Kindle email address configured in Amazon account
- Claude Code

## Repository Structure

```
.claude-plugin/marketplace.json    # Plugin definitions
plugins/<plugin-name>/             # Plugin directories
```

## Author

**Peerasak Unsakon** - [@peerasak-u](https://github.com/peerasak-u)

## License

MIT

plugins.name: apple-notes
plugins.description: Interact with Apple Notes on macOS via JXA (JavaScript for Automation)

plugins.name: send-to-kindle
plugins.description: Send EPUB and PDF files to Kindle via email using Apple Mail.app on macOS

plugins.name: pacioli
plugins.description: Generates professional financial documents (invoices, quotations, receipts) for freelancers using HTML templates and Puppeteer.
